value.title: Australia PM unveils draft Indigenous recognition referendum question

value.title: An Indigenous language could help humans and AI communicate
value.excerpt: One of the most challenging problems impeding humans from communicating with Artificial Intelligence (AI) systems could have a unique solution: a language spoken by Indigenous Australians in the NT. Researchers at the University of New South Wales have published a paper explaining how Jingulu - a language spoken by the Jingili people - could be translated directly into commands that both AI and humans can understand.

value.title: A gold-rush of NLP startups is about to arrive — here’s why
